author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Enjoy picnic-style treats at London Marriott Hotel Grosvenor Square’s summer pop-upTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Enjoy picnic-style treats at London Marriott Hotel Grosvenor Square’s summer pop-up Published on : Tuesday, July 14, 2015
Enjoy picnic-style treats from a retro Citroen camper van at London Marriott Hotel Grosvenor Square’s summer pop-up.
For 20 days only, you can relax on picnic blankets and deck chairs while sampling the likes of lemon drizzle cake and jam-filled muffins from cake-makers Tiptree; or a pre-ordered afternoon tea alongside wine, Pimms and fruit juice.
Hurry as the picnic-style treat offer ends on July 20.
Source: visitlondon.com
